name: Oreo clicker (ArrieBoy22)
description:
Click the save button to create a save file and then if you exit click the upload file button and select the oreoClickerSave file.

This is a clicker game made in HTML using visual studios code. I just made this for fun and stuff like that. I hope you enjoy.

/Here is a download version to have in your files/

Steps to play download version:

  1. copy text below
  2. paste in new tab
  3. It will download and then click show in folder
  4. open up zip file
  5. Select the index.html file and either open it or double click it
  6. Have fun!

Download (any platform, even chrome):

C:\Users\ArrieBoy22\Desktop\oreoClicker\oreoClicker.zip
